text.div:
Rabies (Tests for rabies virus Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    51646-8 Rabies virus RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    51647-6 Rabies virus RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Probe
    70867-7 Rabies virus strain identified in Unspecified specimen by Sequencing
    86588-1 Rabies virus RNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    88214-2 Rabies virus RNA [Presence] in Tissue by NAA with probe detection
    88215-9 Rabies virus RNA [Presence] in Saliva (oral fluid) by NAA with probe detection

name: Rabies (Tests for rabies virus Nucleic Acid)
